titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of July 10, 2024, as Journeyman Lineworkers Recognition Day.
A resolution expressing support for the designation of July 10, 2024, as Journeyman Lineworkers Recognition Day.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of July 10, 2024, as Journeyman Lineworkers Recognition Day. (A journeyman lineworker is a person who builds and maintains electrical power systems.)
